sentences.sentence: The road was reduced to 18 ft in width by adding parking bays.
sentences.translation: 这条路增加了停车区域后，宽度减少为18英尺。

sentences.sentence: The bays and the river mouths where the tide is high (the tidal range is more than 10 metres) are usually perfect sites to build tidal power stations.
sentences.translation: 潮汐高（潮差超过10米）的海湾和河口通常是建造潮汐发电站的理想位置。

sentences.sentence: Commuters who are unable to reach the handrails can hold on to grab poles at the ends of the seat bays.
sentences.translation: 无法碰到扶手的乘客可以抓住座位隔间末端的扶手。
